summary.summary_text: SPEAKER got the results from CIFON. CINNAL has been running some other systems other than the XEOG. Most of the time the overall number for damage didn't improve, but there were some good results. The damage with the straight features is still unknown. Boji and Sunili will leave on Sunday.
